    Show / Hide Table of Contents

    LockUtility

    A utility for locking objects. This utility does not prevent editing by itself, beyond default ASM locking (scenes and collections), support must be added for this utility.

    Scenes are supported by: lock button on scenes in hierarchy and preventing scene save.

    Collections are supported by: lock button in SceneManagerWindow on collection headers and disabling ui elements in SceneManagerWindow.

    Inheritance
    Object
    LockUtility
